code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a female boatswain aged 39 years presents w/ c/o 4 weeks h/o mild difficulty with reading and writing, mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words, mild difficulty in school and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. she does not smoke Alcohol 1-4 beers/month o:Height 61 in, Weight 157 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

s:a 40 yo white f boatswain complained of mild difficulty with reading and writing, mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words and mild difficulty in school. patient denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. o:Height 60 in, Weight 153 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.
